availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: William Robert Davidson was born in October 16, 1842 in Madison, Jefferson County, Indiana. During the Civil War. he served as an Assistant Surgeon in the 7th and 22nd Kentucky Infantry. He died on January 12, 1924 in Madison, Jefferson County, Indiana.

bibl.p: Find A Grave, "Dr. William R. Davidson (1842 - 1924)," Memorial #82118033, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=82118033&ref=acom (accessed June 27, 2017).; Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Madison, p. 61.
